aside.p: Now that the session identifiers are properly embedded, remove support for the Mechanical Turk survey link functionality, which was just a crutch. Moreover, move the Mechanical Turk configuration into the experiment parameters and accept the requested HIT identifier as well as whether the request is to be sandboxed. Also make sure that all Mechanical Turk variables (worker, assignment, and HIT identifiers) are proper uppercase alphanumeric strings.
